import React from 'react' import { Button, Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' const AuntificationPage = () => { const handlerlogin = () => { const clientId = '1174699836294053968' //const clientSecret = '' const redirect = 'http://localhost:3000/auntification' window.location.href = `https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=${clientId}&redirect_uri=${redirect}&response_type=code&scope=identify%20guilds` } return (
